ThingDef.label: skillbook: stinger
ThingDef.description:
A weathered combat manual describing the Stinger technique - a lightning-fast dash attack used by legendary warriors. Reading this book will teach the technique to the reader, but the book will be consumed in the process.
The Stinger is a devastating melee ability that allows the user to instantly teleport to an enemy and strike with their equipped weapon, dealing increased damage. Works with any melee weapon.

ThingDef.label: skillbook: judgement cut
ThingDef.description:
An ancient tome containing the forbidden knowledge of the Judgement Cut - a technique that allows the user to slice through dimensional space itself. This is said to be one of the most powerful melee techniques ever developed. Reading this book will impart the knowledge to the reader, but the book will be consumed in the process.
The Judgement Cut is a ranged area attack that creates multiple concentrated dimensional slashes at the target location, dealing stacked damage based on the user's equipped weapon to all enemies in the area.

ThingDef.label: skillbook: drive
ThingDef.description:
A tactical combat manual describing the Drive technique - a vertical energy slash that creates projectiles capable of passing through solid obstacles. This advanced technique requires precise control to master. Reading this book will impart the knowledge to the reader, but the book will be consumed in the process.
The Drive creates 1-3 energy projectiles that travel in a straight line, passing through buildings and striking all enemies in their path. The final projectile deals enhanced damage and burns targets over time.

ThingDef.label: skillbook: void slash
ThingDef.description:
A dark manual containing the secrets of the Void Slash technique. Reading this will teach the reader how to perform cone-shaped debuffing attacks that slow and weaken enemies. This knowledge, once learned, cannot be forgotten.
The Void Slash is a powerful melee ability that creates a cone of void energy in front of the user, damaging and debuffing multiple enemies with movement penalties and bleeding effects. Works with any melee weapon.

ThingDef.label: skillbook: gun stinger
ThingDef.description:
A tactical manual containing advanced shotgun techniques and supernatural movement abilities. This book teaches the Gun Stinger technique - a devastating combination of teleportation and point-blank shotgun fire. Reading this book will impart the knowledge to the reader, but the book will be consumed in the process.
The Gun Stinger allows the user to instantly teleport behind an enemy and fire their shotgun at point-blank range, dealing massive damage with a chance to cause burn effects. Only works with shotgun weapons.

ThingDef.label: skillbook: heavy rain
ThingDef.description:
An ancient tome containing the forbidden art of spectral summoning. This book teaches the Heavy Rain technique - the ability to call forth storms of ghostly swords from beyond the veil. Reading this book will impart the knowledge to the reader, but the book will be consumed in the process.
The Heavy Rain is a devastating area-of-effect ability that summons multiple spectral swords to rain down on enemies within a large radius. The number of swords increases with the user's melee skill, and there's a chance to summon a massive special sword with enhanced destructive power. No weapon restrictions apply.

ThingDef.label: skillbook: rain bullet
ThingDef.description:
An advanced gunslinging manual detailing the Rain Bullet technique - an acrobatic aerial shooting maneuver. Reading this book will teach the technique to the reader, but the book will be consumed in the process.
The Rain Bullet allows the user to leap through the air toward a target, continuously firing 3-6 bullets per cell traveled during the jump, then land dramatically at the target position like Dante in the classic games. The farther you jump, the more total bullets are fired! Jump height scales with melee skill for better mobility, while bullets per cell scale with shooting skill for more firepower. Each bullet lands randomly within a small area and has a chance to stagger the target. Requires the target to be at medium range (6-10 cells away).
